tool_description:
Imgur's API exposes the entire Imgur infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Imgur's API, you can do just about anything you can do on imgur.com, while using your programming language of choice. If you're familiar with the APIs of Twitter, Amazon's S3, del.icio.us, or a host of other web services, you'll feel right at home.

The full documentation is available at: https://apidocs.imgur.com/
name: Imgur
title: Imgur

api_list.name: Account Album Ids
api_list.description: Get all of the ids for all of the albums associated with the account

api_list.name: Account Album Count
api_list.description: The number of albums an account contains

api_list.name: Account Albums
api_list.description: Get all the albums associated with the account. Must be logged in as the user to see secret and hidden albums.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - allows you to set the page number so you don't have to retrieve all the data at once.

api_list.name: Account Comments
api_list.description: The comments that the user has made

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: 'best', 'worst', 'oldest', or 'newest'. Defaults to 'newest'.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number (50 items per page). Defaults to 0.

api_list.name: Account
api_list.description: Request standard user information.

api_list.name: Account Album Information
api_list.description: Get More information about a specific album

api_list.name: Account Image Information
api_list.description: Return information about a specific image. This endpoint works the same as the Image Endpoint. You can use any of the additional actions that the image endpoint with this endpoint.

api_list.name: Account Images
api_list.description: Return all of the images associated with the account. You can page through the images by setting the page, this defaults to 0.

api_list.name: Account Likes
api_list.description: Return an array of images that have been upvoted by the user.

api_list.name: Account Images Ids
api_list.description: Returns an array of Image IDs that are associated with the account.

api_list.name: Account Messages
api_list.description: Returns all messages sent to the user, formatted as a notification. Required to be logged in to view this information.

optional_parameters.name: new
optional_parameters.description: false for all notifications, true for only non-viewed notification. Default is true.

api_list.name: Account Settings
api_list.description: Get the account settings if you're logged in as the user

api_list.name: Account Notifications
api_list.description: Return all of the notifications associated with the account. Defaults to return only new notifications, however you can set the GET variable, new, to false to return all of the notifications. You're required to be logged in as the user to view this information.

api_list.name: Account Images Count
api_list.description: Returns the total number of images associated with the account.

api_list.name: Account Statistics
api_list.description: Return the statistics about the account.

api_list.name: Album Image
api_list.description: Get information about an image in an album, any additional actions found in Image Endpoint will also work.

required_parameters.name: album_id
required_parameters.description: The 5 character string for the album id

api_list.name: Album
api_list.description: Get album information

api_list.name: Comment Count
api_list.description: Return a count of all of the comments associated with the account.

api_list.name: Comment
api_list.description: Get comment information

api_list.name: Album Images
api_list.description: Return all of the images in the album

api_list.name: Comment IDs
api_list.description: Return an array of all of the comment IDs.

api_list.name: Comment Replies
api_list.description: View the comment and the thread of replies

api_list.name: Gallery
api_list.description: Returns the images in the gallery. For example the main gallery is /3/gallery/hot/viral/0

optional_parameters.name: showViral
optional_parameters.description: true | false - Show or hide viral images from the 'user' section. Defaults to true

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: viral | time - defaults to viral

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - the data paging number

optional_parameters.name: section
optional_parameters.description: hot | top | user - defaults to hot

optional_parameters.name: window
optional_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the section is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to day

api_list.name: Gallery Image
api_list.description: Get additional information about an image in the gallery

api_list.name: Gallery Comment Count
api_list.description: The number of comments on an item in the gallery

api_list.name: Gallery Image Comments
api_list.description: The Comments of a Gallery Image

api_list.name: Gallery Item Votes
api_list.description: Get the vote information for an image in the gallery (also works for gallery albums by replacing 'image' with 'album' in the route)

api_list.name: Gallery Search
api_list.description: Search the gallery for a given query string

optional_parameters.name: q_all
optional_parameters.description: Search for all of these words (and)

optional_parameters.name: q_any
optional_parameters.description: Search for any of these words (or)

optional_parameters.name: q_exactly
optional_parameters.description: Search for exactly this word or phrase

optional_parameters.name: q_not
optional_parameters.description: Exclude results matching this

optional_parameters.name: q_type
optional_parameters.description: Show results for any file type, jpg | png | gif | anigif (animated gif) | album

optional_parameters.name: q_size_px
optional_parameters.description: Size ranges, small (500 pixels square or less) | med (500 to 2,000 pixels square) | big (2,000 to 5,000 pixels square) | lrg (5,000 to 10,000 pixels square) | huge (10,000 square pixels and above)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - the data paging number

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: time | viral - defaults to time

optional_parameters.name: window
optional_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the sort is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to week

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Query string (note: if advanced search parameters are set, this query string is ignored). This parameter also supports boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT) and indices (tag: user: title: ext: subreddit: album: meme:). An example compound query would be 'title: cats AND dogs ext: gif'

api_list.name: Image
api_list.description: Get information about an image

api_list.name: Notifications
api_list.description: Get all the notifications for the user that's currently logged in
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com/3/notification"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com/3/notification"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Subreddit Galleries
api_list.description: View gallery images for a subreddit

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: time | top - defaults to time

optional_parameters.name: window
optional_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the sort is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to week

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - the data paging number

api_list.name: Gallery Comment Ids
api_list.description: List all of the comment ids in an array for a gallery item

api_list.name: Account Gallery Favorites
api_list.description: Return the images the user has favorited in the gallery.

api_list.name: Notification
api_list.description: Returns data about a specific notification

api_list.name: Account Favorites
api_list.description: Returns the users favorited images, only accessible if you're logged in as the user.

api_list.name: Account Gallery Profile
api_list.description: Returns the totals for the gallery profile.

api_list.name: Account Submissions
api_list.description: Return the images a user has submitted to the gallery

api_list.name: Replies
api_list.description: Returns all of the reply notifications for the user. Required to be logged in as that user

optional_parameters.name: new
optional_parameters.description: boolean - false for all notifications, true for only non-viewed notification. Default is true.

api_list.name: Custom Gallery
api_list.description: View images for a custom gallery

required_parameters.name: gallery_id
required_parameters.description: The ID for the custom gallery.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: viral | time | top - defaults to viral

required_parameters.name: window
required_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the sort is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to week

api_list.name: Custom Gallery Image
api_list.description: View a single image in a custom gallery

api_list.name: Verify User's E-mail
api_list.description: Checks to see if user has verified their email address

api_list.name: User Custom Galleries
api_list.description: Fetch a user's custom galleries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com/3/g"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filtered Out Tags
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of the user's filtered out tags

api_list.name: Memes Subgallery Image
api_list.description: View a single image in the memes gallery

api_list.name: Memes Subgallery
api_list.description: View images for memes subgallery

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - the data paging number

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: viral | time | top - defaults to viral

optional_parameters.name: window
optional_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the sort is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to week

api_list.name: Subreddit Image
api_list.description: View a single image in the subreddit

api_list.name: Gallery Tag
api_list.description: View images for a gallery tag

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: viral | time | top - defaults to viral

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: integer - the data paging number

optional_parameters.name: window
optional_parameters.description: Change the date range of the request if the sort is "top", day | week | month | year | all, defaults to week

api_list.name: Gallery Tag Image
api_list.description: View a single image in a gallery tag

api_list.name: Gallery Item Tags
api_list.description: View tags for a gallery item

api_list.name: Random Gallery Images
api_list.description: Returns a random set of gallery images.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: A page of random gallery images, from 0-50. Pages are regenerated every hour.

api_list.name: Gallery Album
api_list.description: Get additional information about an album in the gallery.

api_list.name: Album / Image Comments
api_list.description: Comment on an image in the gallery.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: best | top | new - defaults to best

api_list.name: Album / Image Comment
api_list.description: Information about a specific comment. This action also allows any of the additional actions provided in the Comment Endpoint.

api_list.name: Conversation List
api_list.description: Get list of all conversations for the logged in user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com/3/conversations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imgur-apiv3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Conversation
api_list.description: Get information about a specific conversation. Includes messages.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Additional offset in current page, defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page of message thread. Starting at 1 for the most recent 25 messages and counting upwards. Defaults to 1

api_list.name: Default Memes
api_list.description: et the list of default memes.
